did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.physdesc: Correspondence, artwork, lecture notes, photographs, subject files, videotape, audiocassette, broadsides
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Correspondence, artwork, lecture notes, photographs, subject files, and other papers; includes broadsides for events at Cornell and in the Ithaca community; includes videotape and audiocassette of Memorial/Testimonial service, and other printed items including Kahn's artwork.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, artwork, lecture notes, photographs, subject files, and other papers; includes broadsides for events at Cornell and in the Ithaca community; includes videotape and audiocassette of Memorial/Testimonial service, and other printed items including Kahn's artwork.

Also, "The Unfinished Autobiography of H. Peter Kahn," compiled by Ruth Gannett Kahn and edited by Charlotte Kahn; and spiral bound copies of newspaper articles about Kahn. Typescript on "Religion, Nature and Art," and typescript manuscript of speech, "Technology and Virtue: Joe Blumenthal and the Spiral Press."
Gifts presented to Cornell Library by Peter Kahn on March 20, 1991. Includes medieval manuscripts, caricatures by G. M. Woodward, engravings and other printed teaching samples.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Contents of Box 7 are restricted to permission of the University Archivist.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Peter Kahn papers. #14-28-2920. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
